\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 57602}

\subsection*{Loving Kindness}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{The Odeol}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 &   & inhaled & Nitrous Oxide & \\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 125.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
After 15 minutes of loving meditation

I inhaled nitrous

The patterns behind my eyelids formed sublime

The term mountainous love repeated 

A glimpse of pure love

We wear the world like clothes

Must be spiritual nudists

(buddhists)

Falling over in conversations

over words 

(sublime)

\end{document}
